name: Into The Diceverse
description:
Have you ever wondered what happens when you throw dice?  Well dive into this endless-runner that was made in 2 days for the GMTK GameJam 2022.
We're excited to see what highs core you can get , may the dice be with you!

Sadly I experienced a power outage in the last few hours and was unable to do a bit more polishing but the base game is fully completed !
